actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Claw attack and one Shell Bash attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). The crab has two claws each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Shell Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Bladed Shell
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the crab or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the crab moves at least 15 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with Shell Bash attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the crab can make one Claw attack vs. it as a bonus action.
